EmailTemplate.subject: AutoRABIT - {!Case.Subject}. [{!Case.Thread_Id}]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for sharing your concern with us. We regret the inconvenience caused to you. Your concern has been registered with us as Case Number#: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
We are currently analyzing your concern and be rest assured that we will be contacting you as soon as we complete the analysis.
Note: We may be contacting you to schedule a call or a WebEx session to understand more about your issue and provide a solution to it. If you wish to know the status of your case, please reply to this email. One of our Support Engineers will contact you.
While replying, please do not change the subject or body of the email.
Thanks AutoRABIT Support support@autorabit.com. Case Reference: [{!Case.Thread_Id}]
